title: Дорога из жёлтого кирпича
overview: Varya accidentally meets her first love - Ivan Sobol. From a school friend, the girl finds out that he lost his wife and child in a car accident. And then Varya decides to tell Ivan the story of how 10 years ago in the clinic where she worked, mixed the materials for IVF. And that he, it turns out, has a biological son ...
